description: This is an amazing chat app! Would recommend it!
Has so many features, love it :D
Looks cool, but I dont know a single person who uses it. The usefulness of communication and collaboration software is directly correlated to how many other people use it.
Client works well for the most part, some minor UI glitching. :D

So many great things about this app, there are more chat functions then in Discord, like galleries for videos and pictures, being able to use all your emotes on all servers and chats without paying, less audio issues i always have audio trouble with various microphones across different computers on Discord, but i have only had issues around 5 times since the app was first launched. 

So much more, can recommend.
Its a pretty good app, functions like the desktop app. Decent discord alternative but not many users.
